meanings.definition: The act of transporting goods by truck.
meanings.sent1: Many companies rely on truckings to deliver their products on time.
meanings.sent2: Truckings play a crucial role in the logistics industry.
meanings.sent3: The truckings were so efficient that they delivered the entire shipment in record time.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to truckings was like a well-oiled machine, never missing a beat.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the truckings rumbling down the highway was a symbol of progress and efficiency.
